              it.softphone.rd.gwt.client.widget.base.filter.SortFilterButtonCell<T1,T2>
Type Parameters:
T1 - the DataGrid type class
T2 - the Cell type inside NamedColumn
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.cell.client.Cell<String>, HasLogger, ResourceAware
public class SortFilterButtonCell<T1,T2>
extends com.google.gwt.cell.client.ButtonCell
implements ResourceAware, HasLogger

The button cell data grid header



This class is used as data grid's button cell. When clicked, shows the given PopupPanel at it's bottom. If enabled, can also display a tool tip. Mandatory params:
  • DataGrid the parent grid
  • NamedColumn the parent column, from which takes the name
  • PopupPanel the filterPopup to show on click

Author:
Alessandro Casolla
